channel.title: Some name changes i think needs to be made
channel.description: Why is pretender when she gets voted into king not pretender queen? Im ok with there not being a queen bd or a queen neutral but pretender has a dedicated slot just for her i think she deserves it also a pet peave by definition healing is to make someone sound or healthy again and chronomancer shouldent be considered a healer cuss she doesn't do that
